ch0042_00_nagi/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I thought I saw you come in.
ch0042_00_nagi/0101_0701_02_10:
I can see the glow of adventure in
your eyes. Let it carry you like the
wind beneath your wings!
ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_01_10:
Once, when I was a small child flying
through the sky with my bird Pokémon,
I tried to ride atop the clouds...
ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_02_10:
I gazed up at them as they floated by...
perfectly fluffy and beautiful in the sky.
I wanted to take the clouds on a journey...
ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_03_10:
And do you know what?
I did that very thing! I rode the clouds...
ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_04_10:
For you see, what I thought were clouds
were really a flock of Altaria! You can
imagine my surprise when I tried to ride them!
ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0702_01_10:
Drifting leisurely through the great
blue sky, the song of the Altaria
echoing on the wind...
ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0702_02_10: It felt like something out of a dream.
ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0701_01_10:
In my home of Fortree City, the trees
grow tall and the people live high up
in tree houses.
ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0701_02_10:
We grow anxious when we’re too close
to the ground, you see.
I used to constantly stand on my tiptoes...
ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0701_03_10:
but as you might guess, it led to
a great deal of leg cramping...
ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0702_01_10:
One must always soar gracefully,
even if it means getting a
leg cramp or two!
ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0702_02_10:
Such is the life of we who fly across
the skies with bird Pokémon!
ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0701_01_10:
Pelipper are excellent at scooping
things up in their large beaks and
carrying them great distances.
ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0701_02_10:
We often depend on their services
as messenger birds for this reason.
ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0701_03_10:
When I was younger, my Pelipper was
kind enough to help me take on a
part-time job making deliveries.
ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0702_01_10:
Pelipper and I were never in it for
the money.
ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0702_02_10:
We delivered packages so that we could
learn everything we could about the
Fortree City Pokémon Gym.
ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0701_01_10:
My beloved bird Pokémon soar freely
across the sky, claiming the wind as
their own with their great feathered wings.
ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0701_02_10:
It’s as if their graceful forms are
a manifestation of our desire to
reach for those skies.
ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0701_03_10:
When I’m soaring through the wind
with my Pokémon, I feel like I’m
one with nature.
ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0702_01_10:
Bird Pokémon can teach us how to
be one with nature.
ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0702_02_10:
When I look at you and your Pokémon,
I can tell you know that, too.
ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0701_01_10:
You have a sparkling air
about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0701_02_10:
Your elegant gait seems to carry
a mysterious breeze throughout
the room with you.
ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0701_03_10:
It’s as if Mother Nature herself
is sending the wind your way.
ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0702_01_10:
I have a feeling that if I stick
with you, I’ll be able to soar
all the more gracefully...
ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0702_02_10:
The sky is far too wide for one person
alone...
I’m sorry. Please ignore my ramblings...
ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0701_01_10:
This item was carried to me on the wind.
Here, I hope you use it well.
ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0701_02_10:
May Mother Nature’s great breath
bring you fortune in battle.
ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0702_01_10:
Why do you think the winds of fortune
blow the way they do?
ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0702_02_10:
A good wind does not falter on its path
and leaves the air pleasantly fresh
as it sweeps by.
ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0701_01_10:
I thought long and hard about
how to be one with my bird Pokémon.
ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0701_02_10:
I even tried behaving like a bird for
a while—I would perch up in the trees
from dawn till dusk, singing my songs.
ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0701_03_10:
A few of the passersby seemed to be
quite worried about me at the time,
though I have no idea why...
ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0702_01_10:
Learning to hear the whispers of the
wind was quite difficult as well...
ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0702_02_10:
There are no translators or textbooks
to learn from.
ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0702_03_10:
I feel like I’ve begun to understand it
now, but one-way conversations have
proven to be difficult...
ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_01_10:
Would you like to try conversing
with the wind? It always puts me at ease.
ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_02_10:
A gentle breeze means it’s happy.
A sudden gust means it’s angry or upset.
ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_03_10:
A powerful storm means...well, maybe you
shouldn’t go any closer in that case.
Just a few windy tips for you!
ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_04_10:
Although, now that I think about it,
the wind doesn’t behave all that
differently from us people.
ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0702_01_10:
A pleasant breeze can make me feel positive
and motivated, and when I’m feeling that
way, good things tend to happen.
ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0702_02_10:
Good fortune is carried on the wind,
or so they say.
ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0702_03_10:
I hope the wind brings good fortune
to you.
ch0042_00_nagi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
Do you ever think about how wonderful it would
be if you could soar gracefully through the sky?
ch0042_00_nagi/3002_0701_01_10:
The best time to gauge the wind
is in the morning.
ch0042_00_nagi/3003_0701_01_10:
The key to having a good afternoon is finding
a high place and feeling the wind on your face.
ch0042_00_nagi/3004_0701_01_10:
Hello. I think it’s important to get some rest
from time to time.
ch0042_00_nagi/3005_0701_01_10:
Don’t stay out too late—the night wind can
give you a nasty chill.
ch0042_00_nagi/3006_0701_01_10:
I just love to feel the gentle breeze after the
sun goes down.
